nodes.text: Collo was a Kajain'sa'Nikto male sergeant who served in the military during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.

Sergeant Collo appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where he gave Republic players the bonus series for Alderaan. He, along with his Imperial counterpart Mistress Amaran and the Nar Shaddaa bonus series mission givers, were removed in Game Update 4.1.
